quotes.quote: The speed of time is one second per second.
Speed is irrelevant if you are going in the wrong direction.
The speed is something dangerous but very exciting.
If everything seems under control, you're not going fast enough.
You can speed up your life if you want to that's easy. Winding down is what's hard.
Nothing is as fast as the speed of trust.
I'm going to focus on speed, doing little things like my turns and my starts just speed.
The speed of the human mind is remarkable. So is its inability to face the obvious.
Speed is not always a constituent to great work, the process of creation should be given time and thought.
When speed gets in the blood, one must drive to live.
Move fast. Speed is one of your main advantages over large companies.
The speed of the leader determines the rate of the pack.
It is true that speed kills. In distance running, it kills anyone who does not have it.
Speed now illuminates reality whereas light once gave objects of the world their shape.
My speed is natural and I have been training very hard.
Speed is a great asset; but it's greater when it's combined with quickness and there's a big difference.
Speed is absolutely key to creativity. The more time it takes to create something, the less likely you are to create something.
Speed is no advantage round a vicious circle.
Our speed and size were definitely big factors in this game, but it really came down to just coming out and playing with heart.
There are no speed limits on the road to success.
Speed is a way to escape consciousness and just act.
Speed is often confused with insight. When I start running earlier than the others, I appear faster.
The only thing faster than the speed of thought is the speed of forgetfulness. Good thing we have other people to help us remember.
Speed is relative. You have to live it. You can't just jump into it. You have to live it all the time.
Just speed, raw speed, blinding speed, too much speed.
Speed has become an important element of strategy.
In skating over thin ice our safety is in our speed.
The speed of change makes you wonder what will become of architecture.
Faster, faster, until the thrill of speed overcomes the fear of death.
The future was getting here faster than I'd expected.
